participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and family-oriented, enjoys relaxing and cherishing time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: My pets name is Charlie. I produce music for artists. My favourite food is pizza. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, finds joy in crafting and self-improvement, nurturing a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: I'm retired and living the great life. I've amazing children and grandchildren. I had cancer but it's gone now. I can sew my own clothes.
